Kandadevamālava：A Damila chief who fought against Parakkamabāhu&#39；s   general Lankāpura，and was defeated at Mundikkāra．Later，when Kandadevamālava   owned allegiance to Parakkamabāhu，Lankāpura restored Mundikkāra to him and   appointed him chief of the two districts of Mangala．Cv．lxxvi．187，208，210．
